title: Lindsey Vonn on Grit, Passion, and Perseverance
description:
In this inspiring episode, Lindsey Vonn, the greatest female ski racer of all time, shares her methodologies for excelling at the things you love, cultivating grit and resilience, and overcoming fear. 

Guest Links:

The Lindsey Vonn Foundation: https://www.lindseyvonnfoundation.org


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
